mapper.select: SELECT R_NO, R_ENROLL_DATE, R_STATUS_YN, BI_TITLE, S_NAME FROM RESUME JOIN BASIC_INFO BI USING(R_NO) JOIN SECTOR S ON (BI.SECTOR_NO = S.S_NO) WHERE M_NO = #{ no } AND R_STATUS_YN='Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESUME JOIN APPLY_COMPANY USING(R_NO) WHERE M_NO = #{no}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESUME JOIN RESUME_BROWSE USING(R_NO) WHERE RB_BROWSE = 'recommened' AND M_NO = #{no}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SCRAP WHERE M_NO=#{no}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INTERESTED_COMPANY IC JOIN COMPANY_INFO USING (CI_NO) JOIN JOB_VACANCY USING (CI_NO) WHERE IC.M_NO=#{no}
